photo.description: considered to be the strongest defensive complex of Spanish military architecture
photo.tags: castillo sanfelipedebarajas cartagena colombia
photo.title: castillo san felipe de barajas

photo.description: The central area of Castillo San Felipe de Barajas (usually Castillo San Felipe) in Cartegena, Colombia. It was built on a hill in Cartagena overlooking the old harbor, and guarded the city against attacks from both sea and land. Construction lasted from 1536 to completion in 1657. The castle was expanded in the early 1760s. It was the largest fortification in any of Spain's colonies. I took all of my photos from about the same place. The bus did not stop long enough to allow me to talk around the castle, or go to the top for what is said to be a splendid view of the city and harbor. The castle nominally bears a saint's name, but it was named in honor of King Philip IV of Spain (reigned 1621-1655). The statue in right foreground is Don Blas de Lezo, a Spanish admiral who commanded the defense of Cartagena against a British attack in 1741. Note the wooden leg.
photo.tags: cartagena colombia caribbean cruise 2011 castle fortress castillo sanfelipe burg schloss
photo.title: Cartagena - Castillo San Felipe de Barajas

photo.description: An overall view of Castillo San Felipe de Barajas in Cartagena, Colombia. The full name is Castillo de San Felipe de Barajas. It was built on a hill in Cartagena overlooking the harbor, and guarded the city against attacks from both sea and land. Construction lasted from 1536 to completion in 1657. The castle was expanded in the early 1760s. It was the largest fortification in any of Spain's colonies. The castle nominally bears a saint's name, but it was named in honor of King Philip IV of Spain (reigned 1621-1655). I took all of my photos from about the same place. The bus did not stop long enough to allow me to talk around the castle, or go to the top for what is said to be a splendid view of the city and harbor.
photo.tags: cartagena colombia caribbean cruise 2011 castle fortress castillo sanfelipe burg schloss
photo.title: Cartagena - Panorama of Castillo San Felipe

photo.title: Castillo de San Felipe de Barajas,

photo.description: Castillo San Felipe de Barajas van Cartagena in Colombia. De Castillo is het grootste en sterkste fort ooit gebouwd door de Spanjaarden in hun koloniën. Het is gebouwd tussen 1639 en 1657 op de top van de San Lazarro Hill. In 1762 werd dit fort uitgebreid over de gehele top van de berg . Het was niet in te nemen door de vijanden ondanks de vele pogingen daartoe. Bron: www.columbusmagazine.nl/zuid-amerika/colombia/cartagena/r...
photo.tags: 2011 cartagena castillosanfelipedebarajas colombia mseuropa hapaglloyd
photo.title: Cruise met de MS Europa, 19 dec. 2011 - 5 jan. 2012
